msbt.message: It feels like everyone on the island is holding their breath, waiting.I wonder what's coming, or who
I heard that something's going to happen around here tomorrow.Not sure what or who is coming, but it feels like is just holding its breath.
, have you heard?There's going to be another Fishing Tourney this Saturday!Between now and then, I need to research and brush up on all the latest fishing tips and tricks!
The Fishing Tourney's almost here!I've been dreaming of all the rare and exotic fish out there I could reel in!
There's a Bug-Off this Saturday!Are you going to try to catch some bugs too, ?I'm so excited that I picked up a bunch of new bug field guides to study ahead of the big event!

One more sleep until the Bug-Off!I had to patch a few holes in my net, but I'm glad I found them in time to get them fixed ahead of the event.I'm still hoping to get in some more practice at sneaking up on bugs.

I'm nearly busting at the seams with excitement! I can't stop thinking about tomorrow's fireworks show. Oh, I love fireworks! They're like giant flowers of colorful starlight bursting in the night sky. I can't imagine anything more beautiful, .
Today's Saturday, which means The Happy Home Academy will be evaluating homes tomorrow morning! I'm trying to resist the urge to do a bunch of last-minute redecorating
Have you read your evaluation from the Happy Home Academy yet, ? I haven't worked up the courage yet myself, .
How is it already almost the end of the year? It all went by so fastStill, I'm looking forward to staying up until midnight so I can join the New Year Countdown in the plaza!
, can you believe 's almost over?Everyone will be in the plaza just ahead of the New Year, counting down until we all get a fresh start.

Can you believe it? May Day is only a few days away, !I've heard that the festivities are all taking place on another island.That means Orville and Wilbur will be working instead of celebrating with the rest of us. I'll have to make them a special treat to thank them for their dedication.I wonder if high altitudes can affect the flavor of a freshly baked cookie? Ooh, fun! A research project!

I just remembered! Tomorrow is May Day, and I still have no idea where to get my May Day Ticket. There's only one thing to do in a situation like thisFrantically run around the island and question everyone I meet!OrI could go to Resident Services tomorrow and talk to Tom Nook. Yeah, that makes more sense.
Halloween is almost here, ! We've got to stock up on candy!Oh, wait What should I dress up as? So many options! And so little time left to decide, .
Halloween is here tomorrow. Did you pick out your costume yet? I finally chose mine!My only worry is whether I have enough candy. Hmm I think I need more, !
OoohTurkey Day is just about here. It's the day foodies wait all year for!I'm excited to taste everything, but I want to get some cooking in too. I'd better start gathering ingredients

Did you know that tomorrow is Turkey Day? It's a cooking festival, so I want to do my part and pitch in.But all the yummy food will be in the plaza, and my kitchen is at home.I can tell it's going to be another sleepless night of trying to choose.
I can't believe Toy Day's almost here! Oh, I'm too excited!Ummwe're going to exchange gifts when the time comes, right?I have yours all picked out already. No pressure, !

Feels like I blinked and suddenly it was Toy Day Eve! Do you think Santa Claus will come?Even if he doesn't, I intend to spend the holiday with friends. We'll all exchange gifts and have a great time!
